---
title: "Publications"
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| results: asis

library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(glue)

yaml::yaml.load_file("src/pubs.yaml") |>
  map_chr(\(x) glue_data(x,
                         "{paste(author, collapse = ', ')}",
                         "{title}",
                         "*{journal}*",
                         "{issue_pages}",
                         "{year}.",
                         .sep = ". ",
                         .na = character())) |>
  cat(sep = "\n\n")
```
